Articles.Content:
I have developed an asymmetric aircraft in Kerbal Space Program, something I have not seen many of. There are the occasional asymmetric aircraft posted on the Internet or here on the Forums, but they often look like a pile of airplane parts. I used Ferram Aerospace and several part mods to create a realistic, aerodynamic, possible asymmetric aircraft.

![mOBNFsv.png](http://i.imgur.com/mOBNFsv.png)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/diZRfPEDkiA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(I apologise for the audio balance, apparently the volume changer sliders don't affect the propellers)

[***KerbalX link***](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1428)

-Carlpilot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T09:31:32Z" title="04/07/2015 09:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by carlpilot**

Wow. Reminds me of a BV 141. 

![Bundesarchiv_Bild_146-1980-117-01,_Aufkl%C3%A4rungsflugzeug_Blohm_-_Vo%C3%9F_BV_141.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e4/Bundesarchiv_Bild_146-1980-117-01,_Aufkl%C3%A4rungsflugzeug_Blohm_-_Vo%C3%9F_BV_141.jpg)

By the way, how old are you? Just wondering, because your voice sounds young. And don't worry, I'm 13, so I won't judge you. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

(For legal reasons, you don't have to answer this question. I hate how such an innocent question is frowned upon today online by authorities.)

> 
> --snip--
> 
> (For legal reasons, you don't have to answer this question. I hate how such an innocent question is frowned upon today online by authorities.)

I know and my sister hates me because of any question or comment made, because of kinda just that(and she hates my dad because my dad called 100's of people from asia "orientals") my sister hates me. I am 14 too.
